name: fallenswordhelper
description: Fallen Sword Helper is a Greasemonkey script meant to enhance the experience of playing Fallen Sword, by removing repetitive tasks, presenting more information at a glance, enhancing the social aspect of the game and creating shortcuts to common tasks.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run rollup && npm run uglify
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist/dev/* && shx rm -rf dist/beta/* && shx rm -rf dist/prod/*
scripts.eslint: echo Starting eslint && eslint . --cache && echo Finished eslint
scripts.rollup: npm run rollup:dev && npm run rollup:beta && npm run rollup:prod
scripts.rollup:beta: npm run rollup:betacalf && npm run rollup:betafsh
scripts.rollup:dev: npm run rollup:devcalf && npm run rollup:devfsh
scripts.rollup:prod: npm run rollup:prodcalf && npm run rollup:prodfsh
scripts.postrollup:betacalf: shx mv src/beta_calfSystem.js dist/beta/calfSystem.js && shx mv src/beta_calfSystem.js.map dist/beta/calfSystem.js.map
scripts.postrollup:prodcalf: shx mv src/prod_calfSystem.js dist/prod/calfSystem.js && shx mv src/prod_calfSystem.js.map dist/prod/calfSystem.js.map
scripts.uglify: npm run uglify:dev && npm run uglify:beta && npm run uglify:prod
scripts.postuglify:beta: bundlesize -f dist/beta/calfSystem.min.js -c none && bundlesize -f dist/beta/calfSystem.min.js -c gzip
scripts.postuglify:dev: bundlesize -f dist/dev/calfSystem.min.js -c none && bundlesize -f dist/dev/calfSystem.min.js -c gzip
scripts.postuglify:prod: bundlesize -f dist/prod/calfSystem.min.js -c none && bundlesize -f dist/prod/calfSystem.min.js -c gzip

author: fallenswordhelper
